text: Bɨ Onesipolus pen yɨp ma kelɨgup. Taun Lom nag lel mɨden, ne apɨl, nebeŋ dɨnɨgayn agɨl yɨp ma kelɨgup. Koslam pɨyow dad apɨl, yɨp nɨgup. Ñɨn kuŋay yɨbɨl ap nɨgek, yɨp tep yɨbɨl gup. Pen ned taun Epesus yenek, yɨp gɨtep yɨbɨl golɨgup anɨb ak, nad nɨgtep gɨpan. Anɨb ak, Bɨawl anop agnɨŋɨd apin, Onesipolus binɨb ne okok sek kɨlop mapen nɨŋɨd kod yenɨmɨn apin. Pen takaw olap Bɨawl anop agnɨŋɨd apin, Ñɨn awl nad ak apek, nop mapen nɨŋɨd kod yenɨmɨn apin.
